column1: devonjones/PathfinderOpenReference,open,Please add ultimate intrigue,[],Amazing tool.  Would love to have ultimate intrigue included!

devonjones/PathfinderOpenReference,open,New F-Droid version?,[],"I'm a fan of open source software. Sadly there is no current version of the PathfinderOpenReference-app in the alternative F-Droid store. Is there the possibility to add it back? Currently the older versions have weak signatures and the newest release does not seem to build.
This is great software and I would be happy to install it from F-Droid."
android.database.sqlite.SQLiteCantOpenDatabaseException: unknown error (code 14): Could not open database
devonjones/PathfinderOpenReference,closed,Useless parentheses around expressions should be removed,[],"This pull request is focused on resolving occurrences of Sonar rule
squid:UselessParenthesesCheck - “ Useless parentheses around expressions should be removed to prevent any misunderstanding ”.
You can find more information about the issue here:
Please let me know if you have any questions.

devonjones/PathfinderOpenReference,open,White-on-black mode,[],I'd appreciate a setting to invert text rendering to be white text on black background (a.k.a. ""night mode""). The current white background can be a bit distracting on the game table.

devonjones/PathfinderOpenReference,open,Bookmarked items don't show up in left pane when viewing a specific one in tablet mode,[],Here's what happens:
1) Make a bookmark list with a few items in it.
2) In tablet mode (so items appear in a column on the left), epxand the Bookmarks section, then pick a particular list of bookmarks.
3) Tap one of the bookmarks in the right pane.
4) The data for the bookmark now appears in the right pane, but the left pane is now blank.  In previous versions, the left pane would now contain the list of bookmarked items.

devonjones/PathfinderOpenReference,closed,Updates for spell layouts and some deprecated layout parameters,[],
devonjones/PathfinderOpenReference,open,It does not launch on a Xiaomi Redmi Note with Miui 25. ,[],I have just changed my cell phone to a Xiaomi Redmi Note with Miui 25 and the app is not working. Sometimes I have managed to start it just the first time after downloading it but just in that occasion.

I have just registered as a beta tester following suggestion of a comment. If I can do anything to inform you with more specific data please let me know and I'll do my best (which could be little help).
Thanks for the great app by the way.

devonjones/PathfinderOpenReference,closed,Can't set bookmarks when examining search sub-results,[],When you search for something that has multiple matches and you choose one of the matches, the menu that lets you pick a bookmark collection is always empty, which means you cannot add the item to that collection.
I can reproduce this on both my Samsung Note II phone running Android 4.2.2 and my HP Touchpad tablet running 4.1.2.
1) From the main index, add a new collection.
2) Tap the search bar in the upper right and search for something that will have multiple matches; for example, ""goblin"".
3) Note that at this point, the menu at the top that should let you select a bookmark collection is empty.  Tapping it briefly highlights it but has no other effect.
4) After selecting one of the search matches on the left, the menu is still empty, and tapping the ""star"" icon in the upper right to add it to the collection has no effect.

devonjones/PathfinderOpenReference,closed,Fixed the defect with spell description being truncated at period,[],
devonjones/PathfinderOpenReference,open,zoom or layout issues when rotating,[],The zoom changes inappropriately when rotating the screen.
1) go to a page with a wide table, like Mythic Feats, in portrait orientation
Expected: screen at step 3 should look exactly the same as step 1, and steps 2 & 4 should look alike
Observed: screen at step 3 is zoomed in (or maybe step 1 is zoomed out?). Likewise for 4 vs. 2
Workaround: reload the page by clicking on the heading and selecting the page itself from the dropdown list
My device is a Moto X XT1049 running KitKat 4.4.2
devonjones/PathfinderOpenReference,open,Crashes when navigating back up bread crumb trail,[],In tablet mode.
devonjones/PathfinderOpenReference,open,Adding content,[],Is or will you make it to where we can add stuff to the app
a section for adding content  is all this app is lacking

devonjones/PathfinderOpenReference,open,Improved / advanced search,[],As I've mentioned before I love this app. It's great for looking up things... When you know what it's called.  It would be nice to have a search that would show you the articles that had your results in them.

Currently you can find one of the larger category articles and do a find. But sometimes I find the articles aren't complete sources, especially when it spans multiple books (eg: there is no single complete list of evolutions for an eidolon).
I don't know how you have the db side of things done, but you could possibly include a drop down filter.
For example, doing a search for 'crit' would turn up results such as 'improved devastating strike'
This feat doesn't have crit in the name, nor is it categorized as a critical feat (combat and general) but it does help to confirm critical hits.

devonjones/PathfinderOpenReference,open,Traits,[],I love this tool, it's great for rule lookups, levelling, and as a character sheet reference. I could live to see a trait section breakdown similar to spells. Have them broken down by trait type.
devonjones/PathfinderOpenReference,open,Boomark organization,[],It would be nice to be able to arrange the order of things in the bookmarks.

devonjones/PathfinderOpenReference,open,Spell list organization,[],Besides spells being organized by level I have a few other ideas.  It would be great if spells would also be organized by school.  As an example check out

Also, a way to ""hide"" spells that aren't collected in the currently selected bookmark, in essence turning the spell list into a true spellbook.  There might be an issue with wiz/bards with checking off cast spells.  Something to take that into account could be very useful too. (I might be hoping for a deeper spellbook function than what you are planning with this app.  But as-is it's the only spellbook-like app that's kept truely up to date..Thank You!)
devonjones/PathfinderOpenReference,open,I can't open this app on my lenova yoga 8 tablet,[],It tells me: unfortunately, masterwork tools: pathfinder open reference has stopped

Creatures one or more size categories smaller than the whirlwind might take damage when caught in the whirlwind (generally damage equal to the monster's slam attack for a creature of its size) and may be lifted into the air. An affected creature must succeed on a Reflex save (DC 10 + half monster's HD + the monster's Strength modifier) when it comes into contact with the whirlwind or take damage as if it were hit by the whirlwind creature's slam attack. It must also succeed on a second Reflex save or be picked up bodily and held suspended in the powerful winds, automatically taking the indicated damage each round. A creature that can fly is allowed a Reflex save each round to escape the whirlwind. The creature still takes damage but can leave if the save is successful.""
Is different from the paragraph of pathfinder open reference, in particular the open reference doesn't mention size restrictions.

devonjones/PathfinderOpenReference,open,Highlight selected list items,[],When I select an item in a list, sometimes it takes the app a second or two to respond and load the appropriate page.  There is no indicator that an item was selected, which momentarily makes me wonder whether it registered the press or not, so sometimes I end up unnecessarily touching the screen again.
It would be a nice usability tweak to highlight or otherwise mark list items when they are selected so the user knows that their press was recognized.
devonjones/PathfinderOpenReference,closed,Add OGL content from Ultimate Equipment,[],OGL content from Ultimate Equipment was added to the PRD the other day. Masterwork Tools should have it too.
devonjones/PathfinderOpenReference,closed,Added license and updated readme,[],Sorry it took so long. Did I mention I am a stay at home parent? ^_^
This refers to #79. I will update the parser, now.
devonjones/PathfinderOpenReference,closed,Sourcebook filtering,[], Added support for filtering content by sourcebook, and a preference activity with which to control filters.

devonjones/PathfinderOpenReference,closed,License clarification, possible change",[],"On the [site](http://www.legolas.org/wordpress/masterwork-tools/pfrpg_open_reference/) it states that the code is licensed under GPLv2. I was going to add the license to the project, and update the README to reflect that.

However, before I do that, and while the project still have very few contributors, I was wondering if we could change it to **GPLv3**, or at the very least **GPLv2 or later**. Or, if you want to be supercool, **AGPLv3**. If you would like me to expand on why we should, please ask. Otherwise one may check out the [FAQ](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-faq.html). ^_^
Also, the [parser](https://github.com/devonjones/PSRD-Parser) needs this clarification as well.

devonjones/PathfinderOpenReference,open,java.lang.IllegalStateException: Cursor is closed: DisplayListAdapter.moveCursor,[Label(name=""Defect"")]","java.lang.IllegalStateException: attempt to re-open an already-closed object: android.database.sqlite.SQLiteQuery (mSql = SELECT s.section_id, s.name, s.description, sd.school, sd.subschool, sl_filter.level FROM sections s INNER JOIN spell_details sd ON s.section_id = sd.section_id INNER JOIN spell_lists sl_filter ON s.section_id = sl_filter.section_id AND sl_filter.class = ? WHERE s.type = 'spell' ORDER BY sl_filter.level, s.name)

java.lang.IllegalStateException: attempt to re-open an already-closed object: android.database.sqlite.SQLiteQuery (mSql = SELECT s.section_id, s.name, s.description, (SELECT p.description FROM sections p WHERE p.parent_id = s.section_id AND p.name = 'Prerequisites' LIMIT 1) as preqs, (SELECT ftd.feat_type_description FROM feat_type_descriptions ftd WHERE ftd.section_id = s.section_id LIMIT 1) as feat_types FROM sections s INNER JOIN feat_types ft_filter ON s.section_id = ft_filter.section_id AND ft_filter.feat_type = ? WHERE s.type = 'feat' ORDER BY s.name)

devonjones/PathfinderOpenReference,closed,Updated the code that determines where to store the database,[],Instead of optimistically assuming that there is enough free space on external storage (when present), it checks. this should show just that section of the Alchemist text.

devonjones/PathfinderOpenReference,closed,Characters mostly working!,[],I've squashed everything down into one commit for your perusal, and rebased against your latest changes.
Things that are known to not work yet:
- Deleting characters (not sure of the UI--long press, perhaps? It won't be hard).
- Refreshing character list on successful character creation (I'm not sure how to do this).
devonjones/PathfinderOpenReference,open,Parser editor web app,[],Build a thing to make consistent edits to the database.
